content:
IProductBuilder Interface

Definition

Represents a buildable version of a Product.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("0777432F-A60D-48b3-83DB-90326FE8C96E")]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.InterfaceType(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComInterfaceType.InterfaceIsDual)]
public interface IProductBuilder

Properties

Product

Gets the Product object that corresponds to this ProductBuilder object.

public Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.Product Product { get; }
Value
Product

The Product object that corresponds to this ProductBuilder object.
